thorwin.math.geo.projection

Class PlateCarreProjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.geo.projection.PlateCarreProjection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CylindricalProjection, MapProjection

    public final class PlateCarreProjection
extends java.lang.Object
implements CylindricalProjection
    Very simple projection that maps longitude/latitude directly to x/y. This projection is often used to projection raster data-sets (such as NASA's Blue Marble) to an images. This projection inverts the y-coordinate as images' positive y-axis points down.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
